questions.text: True or False: SQS was the first AWS Service.
Can you use a FIFO queue as a dead letter queue?
answers: You can use either a standard queue or a FIFO queue
You can only use a FIFO dead letter queue in conjunction with a FIFO queue
correctAnswers: You can only use a FIFO dead letter queue in conjunction with a FIFO queue

questions.text: Select the members of the simpsons family
What is the default visibility timeout of an SQS message?
What is the maximum visibility timeout on SQS messages?
Excluding the SQS Extended Client Library for Java, what is the largest size an SQS message can be?
What is the longest amount of time a message can remain in a queue?
What is the maximum number of messages in a queue?
True or False. SQS messages must be in JSON format.
True or False. An SQS message maybe delivered more than one time.
True or False. To send the same message to multiple SQS queues a possible solution is to create an SNS topic, subscribe the queues to that topic, and send messages to the topic.

You recently implemented a SQS queue to one of your production systems. You notice that your SQS bill is higher than you expected and you have a lot more empty receives than you anticipated. Which of the following solutions will help you to reduce costs and reduce the number of empty receives?
answers: Add a second queue for priority messages

questions.text: You run an online service that encodes videos. When a user chooses to encode a video, a message is put on SQS to enqueue the encoding job. Your service offers a free tier and a paid tier. The messages from the paid tier need to take precedence over the messages created using the free tier. Which of the following solutions would allow for this?
answers: Add a second queue for priority messages
Add a flag to the SQS messages to indicate that paid tier messages take priority
Add the free tier messages to a dead letter queue
correctAnswers: Add a second queue for priority messages

questions.text: You have an application where the business logic requires that messages are received in the same order they are sent. Which of the following queues should you use?
If you have a FIFO Queue and you want to configure it to be used in conjunction with a Dead Letter Queue, which type of queue should you use
answers: It does not matter what type of queue you use
You cannot configure a Dead Letter Queue with a FIFO queue

questions.text: In SQS, which of the following are you not charged for?
answers: Transfers of data to EC2 in a different region
Transfers of data to EC2 in the same region
Viewing SQS information in the console
correctAnswers: Transfers of data to EC2 in the same region
Viewing SQS information in the console
